name: Aladino - Natural - Petit Corona
additionalNotes: Aladino is a 100% Authentic Corojo cigar made with tobacco grown by the Eiroa family in Honduras. These medium bodied yet super rich cigars have an old fashioned look and taste that will transport you to the Golden Era of Cuban cigars. Father Julio Eiroa and son Justo Eiroa have partnered in this venture to bring to the market cigars made with passion from tobacco from their own family farm in the Jamastran Valley.
